resources.string: One or more required information is missing here to continue.
Is this event required user pre-registration? If yes, add the opening seat count for the event.
Because of the limited space availability, we expect you to register for this event to reserve your seat.
Is this event plans to have potluck? If yes, then add the potluck food items and their relevant availabilities.
As a part of this event. We are planing to organize a potluck. Please mark your contributions to the potluck by selecting food items from the list.
Potluck will held with this event?
Enter new potluck item name and it\'s relevant availability.
Upload an image to related to the event. This will be cover image for the event that shows in the application.
This shows all On-Going / Upcoming events and Drafted events. Draft events are shown only in here. Only Admin users can see them till they published.
Do you want to delete this Event? Once you delete it, all the data related to this event will delete.
Is this event ready to publish?. Once you published it, all users will see this as an event.
We are delight to have you in the event of \"%s\"!!! Once you register, we will reserve a space for you. For any reason, if you are not going to attend, please make sure to unregister.
We are sad not to see you in the event of \"%s\"!!! Once you un-register, your reservation will revoke. Thank you so much to make your space available due to your unavailability.
Following are the potluck items that you can contribute on the event. By tapping on the item or tap on \'plus\' icon you can sign-up for that and by tap on \'X\' icon, you can sign-out.
